text: Sergey Viktorovich Khodos (; born 14 July 1986) is a Russian épée fencer. He first competed for Kazakhstan, winning the team gold medal at the 2006 Junior World Championships, a team bronze medal at the 2006 Asian Games and an individual silver medal. He then switched to Russia, joining the national team in 2010. With them he was team bronze medallist at the 2011 and 2014 European Championships. He placed fourth at the 2010 and 2014 World Championships, also with the team. Khodos studied at the Sarsen Amanzholov East Kazakhstan State University. == External links == * * * (archive) * * * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Kazakhstani male fencers Category:Kazakhstani épée fencers Category:Russian male fencers Category:Russian épée fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Russia Category:Fencers at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Asian Games medalists in fencing Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for Kazakhstan Category:Fencers at the 2006 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2006 Asian Games Category:European Games medalists in fencing Category:European Games competitors for Russia Category:European Games silver medalists for Russia Category:Fencers at the 2015 European Games Category:Universiade gold medalists for Russia Category:Universiade medalists in fencing Category:Sportspeople from Oskemen Category:Medalists at the 2011 Summer Universiade
title: Sergey Khodos
